sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import { useFormik } from 'formik'; import * as yup from 'yup'; function ModalAddNew(props){ const {handleClose ,show} = props; const [newCourse, setNewCourse] = useState({ image: '', title: '', description: '' }) const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { image: '', title: '', description: '' }, validationSchema: yup.object({ image: yup.string().required('Required image'), title: yup.string().required('Required title'), description: yup.string().required('Required description') }) }) return ( Add New Course
) } export default ModalAddNew;
